channel.title: How do i make a npc say

item.title: How do i make a npc say
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

open up npcHandler.java and search for

					if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) {
						if (misc.random2(50) == 1) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo";
						}
					}

then under it add this

	if (npcs[i].npcType == 1001) {
												if (misc.random2(50) == 1) {
												npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
												npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
												npcs[i].textUpdate = "there are " +server.playerHandler.playerCount+ " players online";
											}
}

and where it says 1001 put the npc number of your npc

hope that helps

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a npc say
